title: What Does an Evil Eye Bracelet Mean?

steps.title: An evil eye bracelet is a charm to protect you from negative energy.
steps.content: An evil eye bracelet is a charm to protect you from negative energy. The evil eye charm is believed to ward off negative energy from others, such as the evil eye curse. Wearing a bracelet with an evil eye amulet or design may reflect bad energy from other people back onto them.

steps.title: The evil eye is a curse expressed through a glare.
steps.content: The evil eye is a curse expressed through a glare. Throughout history, there have been accounts of curses transmitted via dirty looks—typically, the curse is performed against a thriving person by someone envious of their success. The exact origins of the evil eye curse are unclear, but it spans cultures as well as generations. [1] X Research source

steps.title: “Evil eye” is also shorthand for amulets protecting against the evil eye.
steps.content: “Evil eye” is also shorthand for amulets protecting against the evil eye. Confusing, right? But increasingly, the term “evil eye” has been used to describe ocular jewelry used to ward off evil eye curses or other negative energy. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Wear the evil eye bracelet on your left hand.
steps.content: Wear the evil eye bracelet on your left hand. There's no concrete answer to which wrist you should wear your bracelet on, but because your left side is often associated with emotional well-being, many people wear the bracelet on this side.

steps.title: No, it's not bad luck to buy yourself a bracelet.
steps.content: No, it's not bad luck to buy yourself a bracelet. You don't need to wait for someone to gift you an evil eye bracelet. In fact, it may make you feel strong and independent to buy one yourself.

steps.title: You can wear as many as you want.
steps.content: You can wear as many as you want. There's no set limit to how many you can wear. It all comes down to personal preference. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Evil eye jewelry is often blue, but it comes in many other colors.
steps.content: Evil eye jewelry is often blue, but it comes in many other colors. Different evil eye colors carry specific properties and associations: Dark blue: spiritual protection, communication, peace Light blue: physical protection, peace, wisdom, understanding Orange: joy, motivation, energy, creativity, vitality Yellow: focus, relief, rest, good health Light green: good health, happiness, success Dark green: harmony, liberty, happiness Pink: relaxation, calm, friendship Purple: imagination, creativity, refocus, harmony, removal of blockages Red: energy, vitality, excitement, passion, courage Brown: orderliness, tradition, communion with nature, protection from the elements White: focus, cleanliness, removal of obstacles, purity
